attributes.action: Teach Primary Children: the diet / nutrition needs of a human plus how to cook and budget
attributes.additional_details:
Teach all primary / secondary children the dietary / nutritional needs of a human being (consequences of poor diet / health) and how to budget (shop) and cook nutritional meals.
To improve their health and well being and help reduce the cost to the the human race and organisations such as the NHS (obesity / diabetes etc)
